alert.note: Alert for Gillespie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Gillespie and southwestern Llano Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 454 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cherry Spring, or 19 miles northwest of Fredericksburg, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cherry Spring, Prairie Mountain, Crabapple, Doss and Enchanted Rock State Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
